code: import{useState}from"react";import"@fontsource/inria-sans";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LoginFuncionario(){const[rut,setRut]=useState("");const[clave,setClave]=useState("");const[mensaje,setMensaje]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({rut,clave})});if(!response.ok){setMensaje("Contrase침a o RUT incorrecto");return;}setMensaje("Datos enviados correctamente!");navigate("/dashboard-funcionario");}catch(error){setMensaje("Ocurri칩 un error al enviar los datos");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"vista2-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"banner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",style:{backgroundImage:"url('/image.png')"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"red-eleam"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bienvenida",children:"Te damos la bienvenida!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-titulo",children:"Ingresa Portal ELEAM"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Ingresa tu RUN",value:rut,onChange:e=>setRut(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Ingresa tu Clave",value:clave,onChange:e=>setClave(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn-ingresar",children:"Ingresar"})]}),mensaje&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mensaje",children:mensaje})]})]});}
